description:
Writing a book is hard, demanding and a tricky task.

Learn, Feel and Taste Life! Then Learn How to Write about it is all about that.

You will discover the very basics of the human behavior and the essence of their structure.

Two lessons are here to improve the drawing of your characters. Both male and female, as well.

By taking this course you will be able to:

Dig deep and deeper into the human soul, problems and every single feature they have and use those juices to build interesting, mind blowing and unique characters.

Handle the Evil in your novels. Evil characters and the evil itself are very important side of a coin and play a vital part in the content of your text.

Play with sex. 5 Pros and 5 Cons in this game are here to convince you NOT to fall into the temptation of writing about this popular subject. But if you must, you must.

A very special lesson is dedicated to making your story bigger than it already is, without loosing your touch.
title: Learn, Feel and Taste Life! Then Learn How to Write About It
